item.title: WATCH: Ski and snowboard duo turn Boston streets into winter playground
item.description: This ski and snowboard duo took advantage of the fresh powder in Boston over the weekend, turning the city's streets into a winter playground.

item.title: Kristi Noem met with Trump amid scrutiny over deadly Minneapolis shooting: Sources
item.description: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem met with President Trump on Monday, sources told ABC News, amid fallout the fatal shooting of Alex Pretti in M...

item.title: Alexander brothers trial: Prosecution paints trio as predators, not party boys
item.description: Alon, Oren and Tal Alexander face federal sex trafficking charges.

item.title: WATCH: President Trump calls fatal shooting of Alex Pretti 'a very sad situation'
item.description: Trump told ABC News' Mary Bruce that the fatal shooting of 37-year-old Alex Pretti by a federal agent in Minneapolis is a "very sad situation."

item.title: WATCH: Backup of 18-wheelers on Louisiana highway in aftermath of winter storm
